name: Life Sim: FREE Edition
description:
This version of the game has LESS features than the full version and still in development. If you want the full version, i'll keep everyone posted when i'll have the full version released.

Life SIM is a small idle, life simulation game thats still in heavy development and will get updates daily. 

Free Edition  features: 

  • a Hunger, Money, Social and level system to keep your person healthy.
  • Reach up until level 5 so you can earn more money.
  • Play in the browser.

(all of the feaures on FREE Edition isn't finished yet so give me some time to work on it)

Paid Edition will feature:

  • a Life, Happiness, Energy, Goals, and Rank system to keep your person happy.
  • Reach up until level 25 so you can earn more money on job.
  • More backgrounds and different interface than the Free Version.
  • When Purchased, download the game to keep forever!

If I ever get likes and plays on this game, I will like to thanks everyone! I'll keep you informed!
